scripts.build: rimraf src/backend/dist && rimraf src/frontend/dist && pnpm run build:be && pnpm run build:fe
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf src/backend/node_modules && rm -rf src/frontend/node_modules
scripts.ci: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C src/backend install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C src/frontend install --frozen-lockfile
scripts.ci-prod: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --prod && pnpm -C src/backend install --frozen-lockfile --prod && pnpm -C src/frontend install --frozen-lockfile --prod
